title: Goodness And Mercy
itunes:title: Goodness And Mercy
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I've been married for four years and I am not the kind of wife that snoops around to see if my husband is talking to other women. I know for a fact that he is talking to other women and I pray that his commitment to me can withstand temptation. I was married before and my ex-husband and I are cordial to each other, but, whenever I talk to him, my current husband is around..............................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
